definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)

sentences.english: The proof is in the reduced-fat pudding.
sentences.chinese: 证据就是脂肪含量下降的布丁。

sentences.english: When soup and pudding are done.
I smelt something burnt before I remembered I had steamed a pudding.
sentences.chinese: 当我闻到一股糊味，才想起来我还蒸着布丁。

sentences.english: At the Chirstmas party. We have chocolate, turkey, pudding, etc.
sentences.chinese: 在圣诞节晚会上，我们有巧克力，火鸡，布丁等。

sentences.english: Mix the sugar and jelly powder for the coconut pudding.
sentences.chinese: 把椰子布丁中的砂糖与果冻粉混合。

sentences.english: Too much pudding will choke a dog.
If you don't eat yer meat, you can't have any pudding.
sentences.chinese: 如果你没有吃完你的肉，你就不能有任何的布丁。

sentences.english: Why not a site dedicated to gumbo pudding pops?
sentences.chinese: 为什么不致力于秋葵布丁网站弹出？

sentences.english: Brandy is poured over the pudding, then lit.
sentences.chinese: 白兰地斟在布丁上，然后点燃。

sentences.english: Everything from playing football to having Yorkshire puddings on a Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 在周日，踢足球到享用约克郡布丁就是一切。

sentences.english: He had two helpings of pudding.
Transfer the rice pudding into the serving bowl; Chill it in fridge and serve cold.
sentences.chinese: 将米布丁倒入碗中，放入冰箱冷藏，冷食。

sentences.english: It makes a superb filling for cakes and sponges.
sentences.chinese: 它非常适合做蛋糕和软布丁的馅儿。

sentences.english: Tomato bruschetta, oysters with horseradish, burgers and brioche bread pudding.
sentences.chinese: 西红柿意式面包，牡蛎配辣根，汉堡和奶头包布丁。

sentences.english: We jelly the pudding by putting it into refrigerate .
sentences.chinese: 我们放布丁在冰箱里使其结冻。

definition: cookie (loanword via Cantonese 曲奇 kuk1 kei4)
